scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:backend && npm run install:mobile && npm run install:web
scripts.install:backend: cd backend/api-gateway && npm install && cd ../services && for /d %d in (*) do (cd %d && npm install && cd ..)
scripts.install:web: cd admin-panel && npm install && cd ../lawyer-dashboard && npm install && cd ../user-dashboard && npm install
scripts.start:backend: concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n "GATEWAY,ADMIN,AUTH,CHAT,LAWYER,NOTIF,PAY,SESS,USER,WALLET" -c "bgBlue.bold,bgMagenta.bold,bgGreen.bold,bgYellow.bold,bgCyan.bold,bgRed.bold,bgWhite.bold,bgBlack.bold,bgBlue,bgMagenta" "npm run start:dev -w @talk-legally/api-gateway" "npm run start:dev -w @talk-legally/admin-service" "npm run start:dev -w @talk-legally/auth-service" "npm run start:dev -w @talk-legally/chat-service" "npm run start:dev -w @talk-legally/lawyer-service" "npm run start:dev -w @talk-legally/notification-service" "npm run start:dev -w @talk-legally/payment-service" "npm run start:dev -w @talk-legally/session-service" "npm run start:dev -w @talk-legally/user-service" "npm run start:dev -w @talk-legally/wallet-service"
